mapper.select: SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSU.USE_SEQ, QSU.SMP_USE_PROC, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = SMP_USE_PROC) AS SMP_USE_NM, QSU.USE_SMP_VOL, QSU.USE_PPS, QSU.USE_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = QSU.USE_UID) AS USE_NM, QSU.USE_DT, QSU.STRG_PLA, QSU.SMP_USE_APR_IDX, QSM.PITM_NM, QSM.PITM_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QPAP.ANS_NO, QSM.LOT_NO, QSM.BATCH_NO, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN SY_APR_INFO SAI ON QSU.PLNT_CD = SAI.PLNT_CD AND QSU.SMP_USE_APR_IDX = SAI.APR_IDX LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD AND QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI ON QSM.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD AND QSM.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP on QPAI.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND QPAI.ANS_IDX = QPAP.ANS_IDX WHERE QSU.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SMP_USE_PROC = #{smpUseProc} AND SAI.APR_UID = #{aprUid} ORDER BY QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX DESC
